languages.text:
"Many lessons have to you,
Young Wolf, been handed down,
So let this be your last—
Tread not upon
your elders' prey!"
{n}Ferociously declaiming the last line, Ulfar knocks Halbrandt to the ground with a crushing blow to the head, sending him into a deep stupor.{/n}

traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text:
“年轻的野狼，
你已经学了很多东西，
愿这是给你的最后一课。
不要与你的长辈，
争抢猎物！”
{n}乌尔法狠狠地吐出了最后一句话，随后一记老拳将哈尔布兰特击倒在地，打得他彻底失去了意识。{/n}
languages.original_text:
"Many lessons have to you,
Young Wolf, been handed down,
So let this be your last—
Tread not upon
your elders' prey!"
{n}Ferociously declaiming the last line, Ulfar knocks Halbrandt to the ground with a crushing blow to the head, sending him into a deep stupor.{/n}

traits.locale_text:
“年轻的野狼，
你已经学了很多东西，
愿这是给你的最后一课。
不要与你的长辈，
争抢猎物！”
{n}乌尔法狠狠地吐出了最后一句话，随后一记老拳将哈尔布兰特击倒在地，打得他彻底失去了意识。{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text:
「数々の教訓を学べ、
若き狼よ、語り継がれる教訓を、
すなわちこれが最後になろう…
踏みつけてはならぬ
年長者の獲物を！」
{n}最後の一節を凶暴に歌い上げると、ウルファーはハルブラントの頭に強い一撃を与えて地面に殴り倒し、意識を混濁させる。{/n}
languages.original_text:

So let this be your last—

your elders' prey!"
{n}Ferociously declaiming the last line, Ulfar knocks Halbrandt to the ground with a crushing blow to the head, sending him into a deep stupor.{/n}

{n}最後の一節を凶暴に歌い上げると、ウルファーはハルブラントの頭に強い一撃を与えて地面に殴り倒し、意識を混濁させる。{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text:
«Cuántas lecciones,
joven Lobo, has recibido.
Sea esta la última:
¡no acapares
la presa de tus mayores!».
{n}Ulfar, recitando ferozmente este último verso, derriba a Halbrandt al suelo con un cruento golpe a la cabeza que lo sume en un profundo letargo.{/n}
languages.original_text:

{n}Ferociously declaiming the last line, Ulfar knocks Halbrandt to the ground with a crushing blow to the head, sending him into a deep stupor.{/n}

traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text:
« Bien des leçons, jeune Loup,
t'ont été inculquées,
et voici la dernière :
ne convoite jamais
la proie de tes aînés ! »
{n}Après avoir déclamé le dernier sur un ton féroce, Ulfar assène un puissant coup à la tête d'Halbrandt qui s'effondre à terre dans une profonde stupeur.{/n}
languages.original_text:

{n}Ferociously declaiming the last line, Ulfar knocks Halbrandt to the ground with a crushing blow to the head, sending him into a deep stupor.{/n}

traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text:
"Viele Lektionen habt Ihr,
junger Wolf, erhalten,
und dies sei die letzte –
beansprucht nie
der Älteren Beute!"
{n}Ulfar deklamiert die letzte Zeile mit großer Wildheit und schlägt Halbrandt mit einem gewaltigen Hieb gegen den Kopf zu Boden, sodass er benommen liegen bleibt.{/n}

languages.text:
"Genç Kurt!
Nihayet aldın dersini.
Sana son bir öğüt olsun:
Büyüklerin av mı peşinde?
O zaman sakın karışma."
{n}Son sözlerini şiddetle söyleyen Ulfar, Halbrandt'ı ezici bir vuruşla yere serip derin bir uykuya yolcu ediyor.{/n}
languages.original_text:

So let this be your last—
Tread not upon
your elders' prey!"
{n}Ferociously declaiming the last line, Ulfar knocks Halbrandt to the ground with a crushing blow to the head, sending him into a deep stupor.{/n}

traits.locale_text:
"Birçok dersi
aldın genç Kurt.
Bu son dersin olsun:
Büyüklerinin avına
karışayım deme!"
{n}Son sözlerini şiddetle söyleyen Ulfar, Halbrandt'ı ezici bir vuruşla yere serip derin bir uykuya dalmasını sağlıyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion
